channel.title: Apt-get error: Malformed Description-md5 line; doesn't have the required length
channel.description:
Whonixcheck [code] A package manager (such as apt-get) is currently running. Waiting for it to finnish. Technical info: "apt-get dist-upgrade --simulate" exit code:100 [/code]
Tried the following: [code] user@host:$ sudo dpkg --audit [sudo] password for user: user@host:$ sudo dpkg --configure -a user@host: sudo apt-get dist-upgrade Reading package lists... Error! E: Malformed Description-md5 line; doesn't have the required length (32 != 23) 'ffea6fc15220dfe66af0c95' E: The package lists or status file could not be parsed or opened. [/code]
This might be a possible solution, haven't tried it yet, found after googling the error msg in the title Is it safe to do this or is there a better solution? [code] sudo apt-get clean sudo mv /var/lib/apt/list /var/lib/apt/lists.old sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/apt/lists/partial sudo apt-get clean [/code]

item.title: Apt-get error: Malformed Description-md5 line; doesn't have the required length
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.source: Apt-get error: Malformed Description-md5 line; doesn't have the required length

item.title: Apt-get error: Malformed Description-md5 line; doesn't have the required length
item.dc:creator: bambam
item.description:
Whonixcheck

A package manager (such as apt-get) is currently running. Waiting for it to finnish.
Technical info:
"apt-get dist-upgrade --simulate" exit code:100

Tried the following:

user@host:$ sudo dpkg --audit
[sudo] password for user: 
user@host:$ sudo dpkg --configure -a
user@host: sudo apt-get dist-upgrade
Reading package lists... Error!
E: Malformed Description-md5 line; doesn't have the required length (32 != 23) 'ffea6fc15220dfe66af0c95'
E: The package lists or status file could not be parsed or opened.

This might be a possible solution, havenâ€™t tried it yet, found after googling the error msg in the title
Is it safe to do this or is there a better solution?

sudo apt-get clean
sudo mv /var/lib/apt/list /var/lib/apt/lists.old
sudo mkdir -p /var/lib/apt/lists/partial
sudo apt-get clean

Read full topic
item.source: Apt-get error: Malformed Description-md5 line; doesn't have the required length
